item.title: 消息人士称，华平投资支持的网络安全公司 eSentire 正在探索出售事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，eSentire 公司的所有者正在探索各种方案，包括可能出售这家网络安全公司，包括债务在内，该公司的估值可能在 10 亿美元左右。【原文：The owners of eSentire are exploring options including a potential sale that could value the cybersecurity company at about $1 billion, including debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Canalys 称，人工智能个人电脑占个人电脑季度出货量的 14
item.description: 研究公司 Canalys 周二表示，人工智能个人电脑占第二季度个人电脑总出货量的 14%，其中苹果遥遥领先，因为新增的人工智能功能有助于重振需求。【原文：AI PCs accounted for 14% of all personal computers shipped in the second quarter with Apple leading the way, research firm Canalys said on Tuesday, as added artificial intelligence capabilities help reinvigorate demand.】

item.title: UAW 对特朗普和马斯克提出劳工指控
item.description: 美国汽车工人工会周二表示，已对唐纳德-特朗普和特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克试图威胁和恐吓工人的行为提出联邦劳工指控。【原文：The United Auto Workers Union said on Tuesday it has filed federal labor charges against Donald Trump and Tesla CEO Elon Musk over attempts to threaten and intimidate workers.】

item.title: 版权组织删除荷兰语人工智能数据集
item.description: 荷兰版权执法组织 BREIN 周二表示，该组织已经删除了一个用于训练人工智能模型的大型语言数据集。【原文：Dutch-based copyright enforcement group BREIN has taken down a large language dataset that was being offered for use in training AI models, the organization said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 随着竞争加剧，DoorDash 将为美国会员提供 Max 流媒体服务
item.description: DoorDash 周二表示，它已与华纳兄弟发现公司旗下的 Max 合作，向美国的会员计划用户免费提供流媒体服务。【原文：DoorDash on Tuesday said it had partnered with Warner Bros Discovery's Max to provide the streaming service at no extra cost to its membership program subscribers in the United States.】

item.title: 美国 7 月生产者价格涨幅低于预期
item.description: 美国 7 月份生产者价格的增幅低于预期，因为商品成本的上涨受到了服务价格下降的抑制，这表明通胀继续趋缓。【原文：U.S. producer prices increased less than expected in July as a rise in the cost of goods was tempered by cheaper services, indicating that inflation continued to moderate.】

item.title: 福特因高田气囊问题持续存在而发布 "请勿驾驶 "警告
item.description: 福特汽车周二针对仍受高田安全气囊召回影响的部分车辆发布了 "请勿驾驶 "公告。【原文：Ford Motor issued an do-not-drive advisory on Tuesday for certain vehicles still affected by Takata airbag recalls.】

item.title: 星巴克首席执行官拉克斯曼-纳拉西汉卸任，Chipotle 的布莱恩-尼科尔接任
item.description: 星巴克周二表示，Chipotle Mexican Grill 的负责人布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）将接替董事长兼首席执行官拉克斯曼-纳拉西姆汉（Laxman Narasimhan）。【原文：Starbucks said on Tuesday that Chipotle Mexican Grill's head, Brian Niccol, will replace Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Laxman Narasimhan.】

item.title: 市场动荡不安，波动性基金吸引投资者
item.description: 由于市场对经济前景的担忧与日俱增、货币政策的不确定性以及科技行业泡沫般的估值，全球管理型波动率基金上个月出现了一年多来的首次净流入。【原文：Global managed volatility funds saw their first net inflows for more than a year last month, as markets reacted to growing concerns over the economic outlook, uncertainty around monetary policy, and bubble-like valuations in the technology sector.】

item.title: Natura 第二季度核心盈利好于预期，原料药影响底线
item.description: 巴西化妆品制造商 Natura &Co 周一晚些时候公布的第二季度核心盈利好于预期，但由于美国子公司雅芳产品（Avon Products）申请破产保护，其底线受到了核销的影响。【原文：Brazilian cosmetic maker Natura &Co late on Monday posted better-than-expected core earnings for the second quarter, but saw its bottom line affected by write-offs as U.S. subsidiary Avon Products filed for bankruptcy protection.】

item.title: 比特币矿商 Bitfarms 主席邦塔将卸任
item.description: 比特币矿商比特大陆（Bitfarms）周二表示，其联合创始人兼董事长尼古拉斯-邦塔（Nicolas Bonta）将退出董事会，立即生效。【原文：Bitcoin miner Bitfarms said on Tuesday its co-founder and chair, Nicolas Bonta, will step down from the board, effective immediately.】

item.title: 三星电子韩国主要工会周四起因薪酬问题举行罢工
item.description: 韩国三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics）最大的工人工会周二表示，该工会将从周四开始举行为期四天的罢工，在 7 月份与管理层的谈判失败后，就提高工资和奖金问题向公司施压。【原文：Samsung Electronics' biggest workers' union in South Korea said on Tuesday it would begin a four-day strike from Thursday to pressure the company over higher wages and bonuses after talks with management fell through in July.】

item.title: 凯雷将以 38 亿美元收购百特的肾脏保健分拆公司 Vantive
item.description: 收购公司凯雷集团（Carlyle Group）周二表示，已达成一项协议，将以 38 亿美元的价格收购医疗器械制造商百特公司（Baxter）的肾脏护理部门 Vantive。【原文：Buyout firm Carlyle Group struck a deal to acquire medical-device maker Baxter’s kidney-care unit Vantive for $3.8 billion, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：华为准备新人工智能芯片，在中国挑战英伟达
item.description: 华尔街日报》周二援引消息人士的话报道，中国华为技术公司即将推出一款用于人工智能的新芯片，以在美国制裁下在中国挑战英伟达。【原文：China's Huawei Technologies is close to introducing a new chip for artificial intelligence use to challenge Nvidia in China amid U.S. sanctions, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing sources.】

item.title: 通用汽车因制动问题召回逾 2.1 万辆美国电动 SUV
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周二表示，由于担心防抱死制动系统会意外启动，通用汽车公司（General Motors）将在美国召回 21,469 辆电动 SUV。【原文：General Motors is recalling 21,469 electric SUVs in the U.S. over concerns of an unexpected activation of the anti-lock brake system, and will remedy the issue through an over-the-air update, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价：市场冷清，关注 PPI，日经指数回归基本面
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美国页岩公司使用更少钻机生产更多原油
item.description: 根据最新的产量数据，美国页岩油区在不增加支出的情况下提高了运营效率，从而挤出了更多的石油，这将促进全球石油市场的供应，因为欧佩克（OPEC）也计划在今年晚些时候解除减产协议。【原文：Greater operating efficiencies in the top U.S. shale patch are squeezing out more oil without higher spending, according to the latest output numbers, which will boost global oil market supplies as OPEC also plans to unwind its output cuts later in the year.】

item.title: 碳补偿的挫折使企业在实现气候目标方面面临倒退的风险
item.description: 扩大公司使用碳信用额抵消温室气体排放的努力停滞不前，这使得一些公司有可能倒退或放弃减少碳足迹的目标。【原文：Stalled efforts to expand companies' use of carbon credits to offset greenhouse-gas emissions are raising the prospect that some will backtrack or abandon targets to shrink their carbon footprint.】

item.title: 美国小型企业景气指数接近两年半新高
item.description: 7 月份，美国小企业信心指数跃升至近 2 年半以来的最高水平，这再次表明，金融市场在上个月失业率上升后对经济衰退的担忧很可能被过度夸大了。【原文：U.S. small-business confidence jumped to the highest level in nearly 2-1/2 years in July, another indication that financial market fears of a recession following last month's increase in the unemployment rate were likely overblown.】

item.title: 穆迪和标普怀疑波音能否实现年底生产目标
item.description: 评级机构穆迪（Moody's）和S&P的分析师告诉路透社，波音很可能无法实现2024年737 MAX喷气式飞机的关键生产目标，并称该公司在加紧生产其销量最大的飞机时面临着挑战。【原文：Boeing will likely miss a key 737 MAX jet production target in 2024, analysts at rating agencies Moody's and S&P told Reuters, saying that the company faces challenges as it ramps up its strongest-selling plane.】

item.title: 消费者支出疲软，家得宝下调年度销售和利润目标
item.description: 本周二，家得宝公司（Home Depot）预计全年利润下降，全年可比销售额降幅更大，原因是借贷成本上升导致家装项目需求复苏的希望渺茫。【原文：Home Depot forecast a decline in annual profit and a bigger drop in its annual comparable sales on Tuesday, as hopes of a recovery in demand for home improvement projects fall due to higher borrowing costs.】

item.title: 美国制造商受到财产保险费用飙升的冲击
item.description: 詹姆斯-柯什（James Kirsh）预计，他位于威斯康星州、为拖拉机和其他设备制造铸铁部件的家族铸造厂在今年秋季续保时，财产和意外保险的费用至少会翻一番。【原文：James Kirsh expects the cost of the property and casualty insurance for his family-owned foundry in Wisconsin that makes cast iron parts for tractors and other equipment to at least double when it's up for renewal this fall.】

item.title: PPI 将为大量数据揭开序幕，期货上涨
item.description: 在生产者价格数据公布之前，华尔街主要股指期货周二上涨，该数据可能会为美联储抗击通胀的进展及其利率路径提供一些线索。【原文：Futures tied to Wall Street's main indexes rose on Tuesday ahead of producer prices data that will likely offer some clues on the progress in the Federal Reserve's fight against inflation and its interest-rate path.】

item.title: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）策略师表示，日元飙升引发的股市暴跌将持续下去
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）策略师斯科特-鲁布纳（Scott Rubner）在路透社周二看到的一份报告中说，系统性交易策略（包括对冲基金运作的系统性交易策略）继续抛售交易，使过去一个月全球股票期货抛售额增加了约 1090 亿美元。【原文：Systematic trading strategies including those run by hedge funds continue to dump trades, adding to about $109 billion of global equity futures sold in the past month, Goldman Sachs strategist Scott Rubner said in a note seen by Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯吊销美国运通子公司的银行执照
item.description: 在美国运通公司的俄罗斯子公司提出自愿清算申请后，俄罗斯央行周二吊销了该公司的银行执照。【原文：Russia's central bank on Tuesday cancelled the banking licence of American Express Co's Russian subsidiary after the U.S. lender's unit filed a voluntary liquidation request.】

item.title: 音乐流媒体缓解了腾讯音乐第二季度收入下滑的压力
item.description: 腾讯音乐娱乐周二公布的季度收入降幅小于预期，其音乐流媒体平台付费用户的增加缓解了这一降幅。【原文：Tencent Music Entertainment reported a smaller than expected fall in quarterly revenue on Tuesday, cushioned by an increase in paying subscribers at its music streaming platforms.】

item.title: 消息人士称，大众进一步推迟推出 Trinity 电动车
item.description: 一位接近大众汽车公司的人士周一晚些时候表示，大众汽车已将其下一代Trinity电动车项目中的新款ID.4车型的推出时间推迟到2030年代初，这是对被推迟的计划进行重新调整的一部分。【原文：Volkswagen has pushed back the launch of a new ID.4 model from its next generation Trinity EV project to the early 2030s as part of a reshuffling of plans for the delayed programme, a person close to the company said late on Monday.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡监管机构向马斯克的 Starlink 公司颁发卫星宽带许可证
item.description: 斯里兰卡总统的媒体部门表示，斯里兰卡电信监管机构已向埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）卫星部门 Starlink 颁发许可证，允许其从 8 月 12 日起在这个南亚岛国提供卫星宽带服务。【原文：Sri Lanka's telecommunications regulator has issued a licence to Elon Musk's Starlink, the satellite unit of SpaceX, to provide satellite broadband services in the South Asian island nation from Aug. 12, the president's media division said.】

item.title: 中国对外投资配额紧缩促使外国资产管理公司发挥创意
item.description: 中国投资者对海外投资的需求急剧上升，这使得外国银行和基金经理们争先恐后地分配对外投资配额，尽管最近美国和日本市场出现了大跌。【原文：Soaring demand from Chinese investors for offshore investments has left foreign banks and fund managers scrambling to ration outbound-investing quotas despite the recent selloff in the U.S. and Japanese markets.】

item.title: 美国银行调查显示，8 月份投资者减少了股票配置，转而持有现金
item.description: 美国银行（BofA）周二公布的一项对基金经理的调查显示，由于对全球经济增长的预期降至8个月来的最低点，8月份投资者增加了现金配置，并减少了股票的超配头寸。【原文：Investors' increased their allocations to cash and reduced their an overweight position in stocks in August, as expectations for global growth dropped to its lowest in 8 months, a BofA survey of fund mangers published on Tuesday showed.】
